resources.string: If this option is enabled your clipboard will be synced with KDE Connect when you enable wireless debugging using a widget. KDE Connect must be installed for this to work.

If this option is enabled, connection data will be prefixed with connect-wireless-debugging:// \nThis allows user scripts to separate it from other clipboard data and automatically connect with your phone. KDE Connect integration must be enabled for this to work.
Specify how transparent this widget should be.
Specify the corner roundness for widget\'s background. Corner radius ic calculated relative to your system\'s default corner radius for widget background
Choose whether to use surface or container color for widget background. Transparency is applied independently.
This widget provides a switch to enable wireless Android Debugging.
